about.details:
Shashwat Furnishing Solutions Limited is a manufacturer and supplier of furniture and handicraft items. The company specialize in developing Industrial Furniture, Restaurant and Cafe Furniture, Garden and Outdoor Furniture, Vintage Furniture, Mirror Frames, Wall clocks and various other decoration & handicrafts objects. The company engages in the business of purchasing, assembling, finishing and repairing semi-furnished furniture to converting them into finished goods. Shashwat Furnishing Solutions sells its furniture to wholesalers, retailers and customers through online platforms such as Indiamart, Trade India, Exporter India etc.

Shashwat Furnishing Solutions Limited acquired a sole proprietorship business M/s Handicrafts Village in 2021. The company's registered office, warehouse and processing unit are located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced Management Team.
  • Existing Supplier Relationship.
  • Scalable Business Model.
  • Quality Assurance and Standard.

faqs.question: What is the Shashwat Furnishing Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shashwat Furnishing Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 558000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.51 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹45 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on April 20, 2022, and closes on April 25, 2022.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shashwat Furnishing Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shashwat Furnishing Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shashwat Furnishing Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shashwat Furnishing Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shashwat Furnishing Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.
